Dagger.description:
AP : 2
Range : 1.5m/9m
Deals 1d4 slashing/piercing damage (19-20:+0)
Roll 1d20 #ST#/#AT# to touch

30cm square quantity
DC athletics = 10 (+5 if surface is upper 1.5m square)

Ink vial (8gp).name: Ink vial
Ink vial (8gp).description: Blank ink to write on paper

Havenbag.name: Havenbag
Havenbag.description: 2.5kg bag than can contain 25kg of goods without taking weight

Alchemist\u2019s kit (75gp).name: Alchemist’s kit
Alchemist\u2019s kit (75gp).description: Allows to creates alchemical substances and add +1 to craft checks to do so

Minor poison.name: Minor poison
Minor poison.description: Add 2d4+2 poison damage to the next attack

Paralysis poison.name: Paralysis poison
Paralysis poison.description: Add -3m/AP for 2 rounds to the next attack

Catstraw.name: Catstraw
Catstraw.description:
AP : 3(6)
Removes desadvantage to low light perception checks for 3 hours

Acid vial.name: Acid vial
Acid vial.description:
AP : 2
Range : 9m
Deals 1d6 acid damage in 1.5m radius
Dodge save DC 12

Atlantean fire.name: Atlantean fire
Atlantean fire.description:
AP : 2
Range : 9m
Deals 1d6 fire damage in 1.5m radius

Flash grenade.name: Flash grenade
Flash grenade.description:
AP : 2
Range : 9m
Gives -2 dodge for 2 rounds in 1.5m radius
Constitution save DC 12

Thunder stone.name: Thunder stone
Thunder stone.description:
AP : 2
Range : 9m
Gives -2 resilience for 2 rounds in 1.5m radius
Constitution save DC 12

Smoke grenade.name: Smoke grenade
Smoke grenade.description:
AP : 2
Range : 9m
Creates a 3m side cube of smoke for 3 turns

Antidote.name: Antidote
Antidote.description:
AP : 2(4)
Gives advantage againts disease saves for 3 hours

Adventurer's kit (10gp).name: Adventurer's kit
Adventurer's kit (10gp).description: This kit includes a backpack, a bedroll, a belt pouch, a flint and steel, a needle, a whistle, 1m of string, a whetstone, a soap and a waterskin.
